AND E.ROLE_NO != 8 AND E.MEMBER_NO = #{ memberNo }

SELECT ROWNUM , A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_UPDATED_DATE , A.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , A.BOARD_STATUS , A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , A.PROJECT_NO , A.MEMBER_NO FROM (SELECT B.BOARD_NO , B.BOARD_UPDATED_DATE , B.BOARD_POSTING_DATE , B.BOARD_TITLE , B.BOARD_CONTENT , B.BOARD_STATUS , B.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , B.PROJECT_NO , B.MEMBER_NO FROM TBL_BOARD B WHERE B.PROJECT_NO = #{ projectNo } AND B.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO = #{ categoryNo } AND B.BOARD_STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY B.BOARD_NO DESC ) A
WHERE ROWNUM <= 5

SELECT A.BOARD_NO , A.BOARD_CATEGORY_NO , A.BOARD_COUNT , A.BOARD_TITLE , A.BOARD_CONTENT , B.MEMBER_NAME , C.FILE_NO , C.FILE_ORIGIN_NAME FROM TBL_BOARD A JOIN TBL_MEMBER B ON (A.MEMBER_NO = B.MEMBER_NO) LEFT JOIN TBL_FILE C ON (A.BOARD_NO = C.REF_BOARD_NO) WHERE A.BOARD_NO = #{ boardNo }

SELECT (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_OUTPUT D WHERE D.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO ) AS OUTPUT_AMOUNT , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ISSUE E WHERE E.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND E.ISSUE_PROGRESS_STATUS = '대기중' ) AS WAIT_ISSUE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ISSUE F WHERE F.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND F.ISSUE_PROGRESS_STATUS = '처리중' ) AS PROGRESS_ISSUE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_ISSUE G WHERE G.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO AND G.ISSUE_PROGRESS_STATUS = '완료' ) AS SOLVED_ISSUE , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_TASK H WHERE H.TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS ='진행전' AND H.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO ) AS BEFORE_TASK , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_TASK I WHERE I.TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS ='진행중' AND I.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO ) AS PROGRESS_TASK , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_TASK J WHERE J.TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS ='테스트중' AND J.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO ) AS TEST_TASK , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_TASK K WHERE K.TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS ='진행완료' AND K.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO ) AS FINISH_TASK , (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_TASK L WHERE TASK_PROGRESS_STATUS ='보류' AND L.PROJECT_NO = A.PROJECT_NO ) AS PENDING_TASK FROM TBL_PROJECT A JOIN TBL_ROLE_ASSIGNMENT_HISTORY B ON(A.PROJECT_NO = B.PROJECT_NO) JOIN TBL_MEMBER C ON (B.MEMBER_NO = C.MEMBER_NO) WHERE B.ROLE_NO = 8 AND B.PROJECT_NO = #{ projectNo }
